name.description: Name of the directory. Used only internally

partner_name.description: Name of the partner associated with the directory. This will be used as brand name in the platform

subdomain.description: Subdomain associated with the directory. The subdomain will be available at subdomain.vcita.com (or subdomain.myclients.io), required in order to configure host-mapping DNS

whitelabel_subdomain.description: Indicates if the subdomain is whitelabeled. Force whitelabel domain (subdomain.myclients.io) only if host mapping not configured

host_mapping.description: Host mapping for the directory. The whitelabel host, vendor must configure the DNS record to point to the configured subdomain.vcita.com or subdomain.myclients.io

created_at.description: Timestamp when the directory was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the directory was last updated.

urls.description: Collection of setup URLs related to the directory.

cancel_page_url.description: Checkout Cancel page URL for the directory.

upgrade_page_url.description: Upgrade page URL for the directory. When user is directed to upgrade, the platform will redirect to this URL

signup_url.description: Signup URL for the directory. When user is directed to signup, the platform will redirect to this URL

sms_purchase_url.description: SMS purchase URL for the directory. When user is directed to purchase SMS, the platform will redirect to this URL

login_url.description: Login URL for the directory. When user is directed to login, the platform will redirect to this URL

backoffice_url.description: Operator Portal Backoffice URL for the directory.

example.name: Example Directory
example.description: Defines a partner directory (brand/tenant) and its core configuration and URLs.
